i drive an suv.

i always seem to be losing things , most recently , my mind.
My family is very supportive of my child with autism, and we are all working together to help him live a happy and fulfilling life.
I started a food truck to share my love of cooking with the world.
i know how to drive a truck.

content.text: I just got back from the grocery store. What are your plans for the day?
I'm helping my friend who has autism with some school work today.
That's really kind of you. I have a friend with autism as well. How old is your friend?
He's 13. My family has been very supportive of him and we're all working together to help him live a happy and fulfilling life.
That's awesome to hear! I'm sure he's very lucky to have you and your family in his life.
Thank you! He's a great kid and I love spending time with him.
What do you like to do together?
We like to play games, go swimming, and just hang out.
Sounds like you two have a lot of fun together.
We do! He's my best friend.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to run track, garden, and cook
